name: Noelle Yu
description: Senior Noelle is at a crossroads for what she wants to do post-graduation. She's proficient in everything she puts her mind to, but Noelle is struggling to find a focus. She's a double-major in STEM (parental appeasement), but really wants to specialize in art. However, she picks up a hobby that could potentially change that, and drive forward the rest of her twenties.

name: Vanessa Feng
description: Having coded since she was in kindergarten, Vanessa has grown into a formidable hacker. However, there is a secret side to her that is able to hold her own in a fight, leading her to be not only the "girl in the chair," but able to fight alongside other vigilantes when they need her to.

name: Angela Lin
description: One of the few women in a major law firm, Angela manages to stand out amongst the other senior associates and is considered a shoo-in for partner. When something tragic happens at home, and her family needs her, her job may be on the line.
